title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 28 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 28 2022
description:
Covid latest: Shanghai lockdown, Kyrie stands up for fired unvaxxed, Trump calls for end to mandates. Women callers weigh in on the Will Smith-Chris Rock slap. The View and Howard Stern agree with C&B on Will Smith. Virtue-signaling Oscars hosts attack entire state of Florida. Buck's milk joke triggers Twitter. Buck's scarf. E-scooters are having a moment. C&B admit to love of avocado toast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
